title: Sections Inspiration
description: The right sections can serve as cheat codes for success. Below are all of our favorite sections from various apps.

sections.name: Social proof
sections.description: Build trust instantly by showcasing real customer reviews, ratings, and purchases to boost credibility and conversions.

sections.name: Hero #41
sections.description: Captivate visitors immediately with a stunning, high-impact hero section designed to drive engagement and sales.

sections.name: Product reviews
sections.description: Display authentic customer feedback to build confidence and eliminate purchase hesitation at the critical decision moment.

sections.name: Upsell & cross-sell #2
sections.description: Increase average order value effortlessly by suggesting complementary products right when customers are ready to buy.

sections.name: Slider #15
sections.description: Showcase multiple products or offers in one space with smooth, eye-catching sliders that keep visitors engaged.

sections.name: Comparison table #25
sections.description: Help customers make confident decisions by clearly comparing product features, pricing, and benefits side-by-side.

sections.name: Testimonial #12
sections.description: Leverage powerful customer stories and success testimonials to overcome objections and inspire purchasing confidence.

sections.name: Collection #5
sections.description: Present curated product collections beautifully to guide shoppers through your catalog and increase discovery.

sections.name: Scrolling text #3
sections.description: Grab attention with dynamic scrolling announcements for promotions, shipping offers, or important updates.

sections.name: Product variants
sections.description: Make product selection seamless with intuitive variant pickers that showcase all available options at a glance.

sections.name: Featured collection #16
sections.description: Highlight your best-selling or seasonal products with premium collection displays that drive targeted sales.

sections.name: Product addons #3
sections.description: Maximize revenue by offering relevant add-ons and extras at checkout that complement the main purchase.

sections.name: Collection tabs #3
sections.description: Organize multiple product collections efficiently with tabbed navigation that keeps your store clean and browseable.

sections.name: Collection #4
sections.description: Create visually stunning product galleries that make browsing enjoyable and encourage exploration.

sections.name: Contact form #5
sections.description: Build customer relationships with beautiful, easy-to-use contact forms that encourage inquiries and support requests.

sections.name: Testimonial #9
sections.description: Transform visitor skepticism into trust with compelling testimonials that showcase real customer satisfaction.

sections.name: Trust badges #4
sections.description: Eliminate purchase anxiety by displaying security badges, payment icons, and guarantees prominently.

sections.name: Testimonial #17
sections.description: Showcase authentic customer experiences in a premium format that resonates with potential buyers.

sections.name: Image with text #13
sections.description: Combine powerful imagery with persuasive copy to tell your brand story and highlight key value propositions.

sections.name: Eco Testimonial
sections.description: Appeal to conscious consumers by highlighting sustainability values and eco-friendly customer testimonials.

sections.name: Countdown timer #6
sections.description: Create irresistible urgency with dynamic countdown timers that drive immediate action on limited offers.

sections.name: Scrolling product text
sections.description: Highlight product benefits and features with engaging scrolling text that captures attention without overwhelming.

sections.name: FAQ #6
sections.description: Address common concerns and questions proactively with a clean FAQ section that reduces support tickets.

sections.name: Testimonial #6
sections.description: Feature customer praise strategically throughout your site to continuously reinforce trust and credibility.

sections.name: Hero #20
sections.description: Make an unforgettable first impression with a premium hero section that immediately communicates your value.

sections.name: Header #11 (Transparent header)
sections.description: Create a modern, elegant browsing experience with a sleek transparent header that enhances visual appeal.

sections.name: Sticky Add to Cart
sections.description: Improves conversion rate by displaying a sticky add-to-cart bar as shoppers scroll down your product pages.

sections.name: Recently Viewed
sections.description: Cross-sell efficiently by displaying products that your visitors have recently viewed on product pages and in the cart.

sections.name: Cart Notice
sections.description: Create urgency in the cart page with a custom message shown on top of the cart line items.

sections.name: Inactive Tab Message
sections.description: Reduce cart abandonment by dynamically modifying the browser tab's title when visitors navigate away from your store.

sections.name: Wishlist
sections.description: Prevent cart abandonment and increase your customers engagement by allowing them to save products in Wishlists, and shop later.

sections.name: Stock Scarcity
sections.description: Create urgency by letting visitors know that inventory is running low on products they're currently browsing through.

sections.name: Classic quantity breaks
sections.description: Boost average order value by rewarding customers with progressive discounts as they buy more units.

sections.name: Buy X, get Y free (BOGO)
sections.description: Drive volume sales with compelling buy-one-get-one promotions that customers can't resist.

sections.name: Quantity breaks with gift
sections.description: Incentivize larger purchases by offering exclusive free gifts when customers hit specific quantity thresholds.

sections.name: Quantity breaks with ranges
sections.description: Maximize order value with flexible tiered pricing that rewards bulk purchases across product ranges.

sections.name: Bundle builder
sections.description: Let customers create their perfect bundle while saving money, increasing satisfaction and cart value simultaneously.

sections.name: Thank-you page multi product upsell
sections.description: Turn completed purchases into bigger wins with strategic post-purchase upsells on the thank-you page.

sections.name: Checkout upsells
sections.description: Capture additional revenue at the critical checkout moment with non-intrusive, relevant product recommendations.

sections.name: Post purchase one click upsell
sections.description: Increase AOV effortlessly with one-click upsells immediately after checkout, no re-entering payment info required.

sections.name: Cart upsell
sections.description: Boost revenue by suggesting complementary products right in the cart before customers complete their purchase.
